kesako.watcher.runnable

Class SourceWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.watcher.runnable.IntervalDBWork
      • kesako.watcher.runnable.SourceWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SourceWatcher
extends IntervalDBWork
    Check the content of a source and update the index
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

      • checkDirectory

        private void checkDirectory(java.sql.Connection cn,
                  java.io.File dir)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check the content of the directory and add all indexable file to the data-base. If the file fileName.xxx has a meta-file fileName.meta, meta-data is added in the data-base.
        To check subdirectories, the function is a recursive function, and call itself on all subdirectories
        Parameters:
        dir - directory to check file.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • fileProcessing

        private void fileProcessing(java.sql.Connection cn,
                  java.io.File file)
        If a new file is discovered, the file is added to the data-base. If the file or the meta-file, has been modified, the data-base is updated to allow its reindexing.
        Parameters:
        file - file to add to the data-base.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • doWork

        protected void doWork()
        Check the directory for any changes.
        Specified by:
        doWork in class IntervalDBWork
